headline: Mettler-Toledo International Inc. (MTD): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Mettler-Toledo International Inc. on Flyover Stocks’s Substack by Todd Wenning. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MTD. Mettler-Toledo International Inc.’s share was trading at $1392.80 as of January 29th. MTD’s trailing and forward P/E were 35.00 and 30.58 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
